name: Bonfire is calling
description:
elemental of the world series #2 : fire


We haven't been able to go anywhere since the pandemic started, it's been difficult to see our friends and relatives.


We're stressed, burned out in our rooms, unsure whether the pandemic will ever end.

Some of us have lost family members, friends, and lovers.

Some of us are losing our minds. 


So I wrote this song with a bonfire as a symbol to remind us that we're all in this together, that we can get through this together, and believe  we can gather around the bonfire again, play some guitar, and sing along. I believe and hoping this bonfire will keep us warm and alive

Visual : Aloysius Nitia
Music  : At.Nite
Format : 2080 x 2080, mp4, Wav.
